_entry.TEXT: Come closer...my machine...come delight in my experience. My knowledge is...very cool. I live, and love, to share.

experience.TEXT: I'm sort of the local historian around these parts. I preserve the history. I'm the big nut on that subject in this zone.

history.TEXT: I'm so glad you asked. Well, I was built here about...one hundred years ago. And I've been here ever since.

since.TEXT: Sometimes other people walk by! This building that I am standing on is always here. Thank you!

share.TEXT: What is wisdom for if not sharing? What is the ground for if not...walking. What is arms do but grabbing?
